## Source: ossf-package-analysis (85a3b67882ce27c0db4858f9509396a2a74b670426897002d8ccc9d29537c008)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'hardhat-deploy-others' @ 9.9.10 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
